alert.note: Alert for Des Moines; Lee (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 05 at 2:34AM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...Slow-moving thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Henderson, southwestern McDonough, Hancock, southeastern Des Moines and central Lee Counties through 330 AM CDT... At 234 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking slow-moving thunderstorms along a line extending from near West Point. Movement was northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Strong winds could break small tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
